name: The Dimensional Listening Gate
fieldIntelligence: To activate a mode of perception that can listen across multiple dimensions simultaneously and through time. This Meta-Glyph combines deep, receptive presence (Ω6) with an awareness of a system's evolving patterns (Ω16) and the capacity to perceive different layers of reality (Ω27). It allows a practitioner to hear not only what is being said, but also the emotional, historical, and systemic contexts from which it arises.
